intro: Laqya App helps you report missing items and find lost people easily and quickly.

lost_and_found_office_description: This is the location of the official Lost & Found office inside the Haram.
map_description: Location of the office inside the Haram to deliver or collect lost items
tracking_available_makkah_only: Tracking is only available inside the Haram area
instruction_submit_desc: If you lose or find an item, submit a report with clear details and an image.
instruction_match_desc: Our system automatically compares lost and found reports and notifies you of potential matches.
instruction_qr_desc: After submitting a report, a QR code is generated to help confirm item ownership.
instruction_verify_desc: The employee scans the QR code when delivering or receiving a reported item.
desc_add_report: You can report a lost or found item with all necessary details and images.
desc_view_reports: Track the status of your reports and edit or delete them if needed.
desc_use_qr: When delivering or claiming an item, show the QR code to the officer.
desc_check_matching: If someone reported an item matching yours, you‚Äôll see it here.
desc_map: Locate the Lost & Found office and other important Haram locations on the map.
instructions_intro: Please follow the steps below to use the app properly:
step1_desc: You can report a missing or found item using the Add Report section.
step2_desc: Provide a clear title, description, category, location, and image of the item.
step3_desc: Once you‚Äôve completed the form, submit it to generate a QR code.
step4_desc: When you go to the lost & found office, show your QR code to verify your report.
step5_desc: You can view your submitted reports, check status, and see matching items.
add_report_instruction: Fill out the form with item details and submit it.
attach_image_instruction: Upload a clear photo of the lost/found item.
receive_qr_instruction: A QR code will be generated for your report.
go_to_office_instruction: Visit the Lost & Found office in the Haram area.
confirm_delivery_instruction: Show your QR code to confirm item retrieval.
your_report_has_been_received: Your report has been received and is being reviewed.
your_report_status_is_now_matched: Your report has been matched with a found item.
your_item_has_been_delivered: The item has been successfully delivered.
notification_report_submitted_desc: Your report has been received and is being processed.
notification_status_updated_desc: The status of your report has changed.
notification_match_found_desc: An item matching your report has been found.
notification_item_delivered_desc: The item has been delivered to the client.
delete_confirm_body: Do you Want Delete this Report?
are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to update the report status?
item_matched_owner: The item you found has been matched with its owner. Thank you! üåü
error_confirming: An error occurred while confirming the match. Please try again.
congratulations_delivered: üéâ Congratulations! Your lost item has been successfully delivered to you. Thank you for using our service.
scan_qr_content: When delivering an item to its owner, scan the QR code from the reporter's device to confirm the delivery and update the report status automatically.
match_reports_content: Reports with automatic matches are displayed. Make sure to review and confirm the information before taking action.
update_status_content: You can change the report status from 'Processing' to 'Delivered' or 'Closed' based on the actions taken.
view_details_content: Tap any report to view its full details, including image, timeline, and reporter information.
